Returns: A TtsSpan built with parameters of this builder.
build().Description: Returns a TtsSpan built from the parameters set by the setter methods.

ClassDesc: A simple builder for TtsSpans. This builder can be used directly, but the more specific subclasses of this builder like @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TextBuilder_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CardinalBuilder_E@ are likely more useful. This class uses generics so methods from this class can return instances of its child classes, resulting in a fluent API (CRTP pattern).
